Silver Flame's Embrace.name: Silver Flame's Embrace
Silver Flame's Embrace.flavor: You erupt into a column of living silver flame.
Silver Flame's Embrace.effect: Until the stance ends, you gain a +2 bonus to all defenses and to saving throws. In addition, until the stance ends, whenever an enemy hits you with a melee attack, it must succeed on a saving throw or become blinded until the start of its next turn.
